auth.welcomeDescription: Your privacy is our priority. Authenticate to access your secure content.
auth.biometricNotAvailableMessage: Please set up biometric authentication on your device for enhanced security.
auth.sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired due to inactivity. Please authenticate again.

home.title: Your Secure Vault
home.subtitle: All your private content is protected with military-grade encryption
home.securityFeatures: AES-256 encryption ‚Ä¢ Screenshot protection ‚Ä¢ Auto-delete enabled
home.privacyDescription: Save Me uses AES-256 encryption, the same standard used by governments and banks worldwide. Your data never leaves your device unencrypted.

secureDrive.title: Secure Drive
secureDrive.description: AES-256 encrypted storage for your private media

privateCamera.title: Private Camera
privateCamera.description: Take photos directly in the app with no external storage

sharedWithMe.description: View content shared by other registered users

secureDrive.title: Secure Drive

secureDrive.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file?

privateCamera.title: Private Camera
privateCamera.requestPermission: We need your permission to use the camera

shareWithUsers.title: Share with Users
shareWithUsers.noUsersDescription: Add users in the Manage Users section to share content with them
shareWithUsers.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one user to share with

sharedWithMe.title: Shared with Me
sharedWithMe.emptyStateDescription: Content shared with you by other users will appear here

manageUsers.title: Manage Users
manageUsers.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

accessLog.title: Access Log
accessLog.emptyStateDescription: All login attempts and file access will be logged here

profile.title: Profile
profile.panicDeleteMessage: This will permanently delete ALL your secure files and shared content. This action cannot be undone!
profile.allDeletedMessage: All secure files have been permanently deleted
profile.privacyFeatures:
- AES-256 end-to-end encryption
- Zero-knowledge storage
- Screenshot & screen recording protection
- Auto-delete after 24 hours
- Complete access logging
profile.ghostModeMessage: The app icon will be hidden from your home screen. To access the app, use the secret gesture or search for it.
profile.changePasswordSoon: This feature will be available soon
